subject: Fwd: Thank you, we are accepting your refinance loan request
body:
Your credit does not matter to us!
 
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE pin money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your entire payment by a third or more, here is our best deal we can offer you NOW (hurry, this tender will expire NOW):
 
$263,000+ loan
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
 
Hurry, when our best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply finish this simple form... 
 
Do not worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
 
http://lelders.com/
